snippet.title: Once Upon a Rogue's Tale - Official Trailer | Six One Indie Showcase
snippet.description: Embark on a journey through your favorite fairytales in this charming roguelike deckbuilder. Trade dice in battle to play lots of different cards or to use powerful character abilities. Encounter story events and make tough decisions that shape your journey as it unfolds in your personal storybook. Check out the trailer for Once Upon a Rogue's Tale to see what to expect from this roguelike deckbuilder game, available now in Steam Early Access. A demo is also available now on Steam.
